main_text_0: With our company, you will never ask your mother for a euro for bread again. You will earn all the money that exists in this world.
main_text_1: We will get back to you 100%, we are looking for exactly you and we need your excellent knowledge!
second_text_0: The presidential salary is a matter of course here. In no case will you leave empty-handed.
second_text_1: Smoke break every 7 minutes and work only 25 hours a day.
second_text_2: Since everyone earns billions, no one over 30 works for us.
